high_descs: Turn to the left, walk to the bed, turn right, walk almost to the window, then turn right to face the desk.
Pick up the mug that is on the desk closest to the wall.
Turn to the right, walk almost to the hamper, turn left, walk to the wall, then turn left to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a mug using the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: turn left, walk to the bed, turn right, walk across room, turn right to face desk
pick up the white mug from the desk
turn right, walk across the room, turn left, walk to the wall, turn left to face desk
anns.task_desc: examine a mug with the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and go to the bed, then turn right and go towards the wall, then turn right to face the desk.
Pick up the mug nearest to the wall on the desk.
Turn right and go toward the wall, then turn left go to the wall, then turn left to face the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a mug in the light of a lamp.
